{{copy edit|date=January 2011}} {{Big Brother endgame |seriesname = [[Secret Story (TV series)|Secret Story]] |image =<!-- Do NOT place a non-free image here without complying with WP:NFCC #10c --> |imagebg = #fff |series = First series (2010) |next= Secret Story 2011 (Portugal) |legendnom = Up for Eviction |legendrunner = Runner Up |legendevic = Evicted |legendwalk = Walked |legendeject= Ejected | hm1 = AntÃ³nio | hm1-enter = Day 1 | hm1-exit = Day 90 | hm1-stat = winner | hm2 = Ana Isabel | hm2-enter = Day 1 | hm2-exit = Day 90 | hm2-stat = runner | hm3 = Vera | hm3-enter = Day 1 | hm3-exit = Day 90 | hm3-stat = evic | hm4 = Ivo | hm4-enter = Day 1 | hm4-exit = Day 90 | hm4-stat = evic | hm5 = Andreia | hm5-enter = Day 1 | hm5-exit = Day 77 | hm5-stat =evic | hm6 = Hugo F. | hm6-enter = Day 1 | hm6-exit = Day 70 | hm6-stat =evic | hm7 = Joana | hm7-enter = Day 1 | hm7-exit = Day 63 | hm7-stat =evic | hm8 = ZÃ© Miguel | hm8-enter = Day 1 | hm8-exit = Day 56 | hm8-stat =evic | hm9 = VÃ­tor | hm9-enter = Day 1 | hm9-exit = Day 54 | hm9-stat =eject | hm10 = Catarina | hm10-enter = Day 1 | hm10-exit = Day 49 | hm10-stat =evic | hm11= Hugo M. | hm11-enter = Day 1 | hm11-exit = Day 42 | hm11-stat = evic | hm12 = Jade | hm12-enter = Day 1 | hm12-exit = Day 35 | hm12-stat = evic | hm13 = Renato | hm13-enter = Day 1 | hm13-exit = Day 28 | hm13-stat = evic | hm14 = Daniela | hm14-enter = Day 1 | hm14-exit = Day 21 | hm14-stat = evic | hm15 = Vasco | hm15-enter = Day 1 | hm15-exit = Day 14 | hm15-stat = evic | hm16 = Doriana | hm16-enter = Day 1 | hm16-exit = Day 7 | hm16-stat = evic | hm17 = MÃ¡rio | hm17-enter = Day 1 | hm17-exit = Day 4 | hm17-stat = evic }} '''Secret Story 2010 (Portugal)''' ''(Casa dos Segredos)'' was the first season of the Portuguese version of the reality show [[Secret Story]], based on the original French version. The series started on October 3, 2010 and the finale was on December 31, which took place on [[Campo Pequeno]], [[Lisbon]]. It aired on [[TelevisÃ£o Independente|TVI]] and was produced by [[Endemol]] Portugal. The show lasted three months and was hosted by Julia Pinheiro, Pedro Granger, and Leonor Poeiras.
The eviction shows (also called Galas) took place on Sundays and, on the other days of the week, there was a daily diary of what happened in the house. Both were on at prime time. Also, a sister show called "Secret Story Extra", showing late-night, showed more of the events that took place in the house. On cable TV channel [[TVI Direct]], the show was broadcast 24/7. Since November the 15th, another hour of Secret Story begun to be broadcasted on late afternoon, therefore making 3 programmes per day plus an 24/7 channel. In that space, since Week 8, the public could vote for secret missions that houseamtes would make. At Saturdays only one show aired, a special one with the best moments of the week called "Secret Story Fim-de-Semana"(Secret Story Weekend). A special CD was made with the theme song and housemates' favorite songs.
The format is based on the French one, although this version had more secret missions. These missions were imposed by "a Voz" ('The Voice'). "A Voz" acted similarly to Big Brother in other Big Brother versions. If a housemate found out another housemate's secret, he or she would win the total money of that housemate. The money prizes for each mission was different. Only the four finalists received their account money. Nominations followed the standard [[Big Brother (TV series)|Big Brother]] format, with the only difference being that nominations alternated weekly, with boys nominating one week and the girls nominating the other week. Only two housemates could be up for eviction in each round. This means that if there was a tie in the nominations, there had to be a 2nd round, and in that round only the tied housemates could be nominated. Along the series, housemates developed friendships, dividing into two groups: Boi Marinho and Toupeira. Although at the end of Week 8, when VÃ­tor was expelled, all the housemates became closer.
There were rumors that would be adapted for an English version, but yet they were just rumors.
==Housemates== ===Ana Isabel=== Ana Isabel Ribeiros is 26 years old and lives in [[GuimarÃ£es]].She entered the House on day 1 . Her secret is: we are a real couple(shared with VÃ­tor). She found MÃ¡rio and Renato's secret on day 2. Hugo F. told to Ana Isabel on week 2 he already knew her secret,but didn't have got courage or money to reveal it.She confirmed that was her secret.Consequently, "A Voz" took out all of her money and gave her one mission: make believe to Hugo F. that he was wrong. Since then, they became very close friends in the House. On day 25, Renato found her secret. Se was the runner-up of "Secret Story-Casa dos Segredos" season 1.
===Andreia=== Andreia Leal is 37 years old and lives in [[Oporto]]. She entered the House on day 1. Her secret is:"I worked as an escort" and it was found by Ivo, on day 66.She was considered one of the best players and bluffers inside the House. She was very close of the group "Toupeira" and was very friend of Hugo F., Ana Isabel and Ivo. She was evicted of the House on day 77, with 55% of the votes against Ana Isabel.
===AntÃ³nio=== Antonio QueirÃ³s he's 28 anos and lives in American . His secret is that he had a bar switch. He found Ivo's secret and Ivo found Antonio's secret too.
===Catarina=== Catarina is 20 and lives in [[Rio Tinto (Gondomar)|Rio Tinto]]. She entered the House on Day 1. Her secret is that she is the accomplice of "a Voz". She had a very difficult life before Secret Story and people thought her secret was related to that. She was friends with the "Toupeira" group. Catarina was evicted on Day 49 with 37% of the public votes against Joana and Andreia.
===Daniela=== Daniela Martins is 23. She was born on the region of [[TrÃ¡s-os-Montes (region)|TrÃ¡s-os-Montes]] but she lives in [[Luxembourg]] since she was 5 years old. She entered the House on Day 1. She was on the [[Secret Story 2009 (France)|third season of Secret Story]] in [[France]], where she was evicted on Day 7. Her secret was that she spent nine years in a convent. She had a romance with Vasco and a very close friendship with Vera. She was evicted on Day 21 with 62% of the votes against Ana Isabel.
In May 2011 she participated in the second season of ''[[Les Anges de la tÃ©lÃ©-rÃ©alitÃ©]]'', which takes place this time in Miami. it found for the game, eight other former candidates for reality TV, including her former boyfriend of ''Secret Story 3'' in France, Jonathan.
===Doriana=== Doriana is 20 and lives in [[Porto Santo]]. She entered the House on Day 1. Her secret is: "I posed nude for a magazine." She was mostly described as kinda shy, but she told that she acted like that so that her boyfriend (in the real world) would still love her. She was evicted on Day 7 against Joana with 68% of the votes.
===Hugo F.=== Hugo Felgueiras is 26 and lives in [[Porto]]. He entered the House on Day 1. He made a lot of attempts to discover secrets, and he discovered some but many players clicked before of him. He was closr to the "Toupeira" group and had a very close friendship with Ana Isabel. Hugo F. was considered humble, funny and a "Don Juan" . He was evicted on Day 70 with 46% of the public vote against AntÃ³nio and Ivo.
===Hugo M.=== Hugo Marques is 23 and lives in [[Lisbon]]. He entered the House on Day 1. He has a common secret with Joana: "We are a fake couple." Their secret was discovered on Day 18 by Jade, but both decided to continue the relationship. He had a bigger friendship to the "Boi Marinho" group and people had doubts about his feelings with Joana. On Day 42 he was evicted with 53% against ZÃ© Miguel and AntÃ³nio.
===Ivo=== Ivo is 31 and lives in [[Lisbon]]. He entered the House on Day 1. His secret is: "I have got an [[obsessive-compulsive disorder]]". It was found by AntÃ³nio on Day 80. He get the fourth place.
===Jade=== Jade Carpinteiro is 22. She lived in [[France]] but now lives in [[Coimbra]]. She entered the House on Day 1. Her secret is that when she lived in France, she participated in a car robbery with her boyfriend. She discovered Hugo M. and Joana's secret on Day 18. She had more friendship with the Toupeira Group and was described as funny. She was evicted on Day 35 with 56% of the public vote against Ana Isabel.
===Joana=== Joana Janeiro is 23 and lives in [[Lisbon]]. She entered the house on Day 1. She has a common secret with Hugo M.: "We are a fake couple." Their secret was discovered on Day 18 by Jade, but both decided to continue the relationship. In the beginning, Joana said that she would act in the house, as her dream is to be an actress. She was closer to the "Boi Marinho" group. Many times she said that she would "declare war" on Ana Isabel, but after VÃ­tor's ejection all the housemates became closer, and she started to develop a friendship with her. She was evicted on Day 63 with 54% of the votes against Ana Isabel.
===MÃ¡rio=== MÃ¡rio Lima is 26, lives in [[Pontinha]] and he is Renato's twin brother. He lives in a secret room for one week, and secretly exchanges positions with his twin brother Renato because of their shared secret. If they're not discovered till the end of Day 2, they will continue in the house. If they are they will both be up for eviction. Their secret was discovered on Day 2 by Ana Isabel. Mario was evicted on Day 4 with 27% to save against his brother.
===Renato=== Renato Lima tem 26 anos e mora na Pontinha. Ele entrou na casa no dia 3/10. O Seu segredo Ã© que ele era irmÃ£o gÃ©meo de MÃ¡rio. O segredo foi descoberto na 2Âªsemana por Ana Isabel. No dia 25, ele descobriu o segredo da Ana Isabel e do VÃ­tor. Ele estava na competiÃ§Ã£o no grupo"Boi Marinho". Ele foi expulso no dia 28, com 73% dos votos contra 27% do VÃ­tor.
===Vasco=== Vasco Oliveira is 28 and lives in [[Porto]]. He entered the House on Day 1. His secret is that he is the son of a public figure, [[AntÃ³nio LuÃ­s Alves Ribeiro Oliveira]]. He had a strong friendship with Vera and Daniela which he called "O triÃ¢ngulo" (The Triangle). In his final days in the house, he had a relationship with Daniela. He was the creator of the "Boi Marinho Group". Vasco was evicted on Day 14 with 69% of the votes against VÃ­tor.
===Vera=== Vera is 21 and lives in [[Sintra]]. She entered the House on Day 1. She said her secret to other housemates on Day 22, without saying that it was her secret, but still she was punished by losing all her account money. Her secret is that she had an affair with a famous Portuguese football player (Ruben Amorim). Vera is the only housemate that never was been nominated. Vera got the third place.
===VÃ­tor=== VÃ­tor Rangel is 37 and lives in [[Porto]]. He entered the House on Day 1. His secret is that he is in a relationship with Ana Isabel. Hugo F. revealed to Ana Isabel on Day 8 that he already knew her and VÃ­tor's secret, but he couldn't click on the "Button of Secrets" since he was short 300â¬. Their secret was discovered on Day 25 by Renato. For most of the series people were asking if he and Ana Isabel still dated. He was closer to the "Toupeira" group and he had the so called "most difficult secret mission" where he had to go to a secret room and the others had to believe he walked. It was there that his and Ana Isabel love was proved however he was ejected on Day 54 because of disrespect both Hugo F. and Ana Isabel psychologically and also becoming aggressive. That was during a party and he was drunk.
===ZÃ© Miguel=== ZÃ© Miguel Fernandes is 34 and lives in [[Irivo]]. He entered the House on Day 1. He had more friendship with the "Boi Marinho" group, and had a crush on Ana Isabel. Many of the other housemates thought his secret was that he was bissexual or homossexual. He was evicted on Day 56 with 62% of the public vote against Hugo F.
==Secrets== There are 14 secrets in the House for this first season.<ref name="tvi.iol.pt">TVI,''Os 14 segredos do Secret Story'',"[http://www.tvi.iol.pt/secretstory/noticias/secretstory-segredos-gala/1196255-5647.html]"</ref> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Secret !! Person !! Discovered by !! Discovered in: |- | I'm a celebrity son/daughter || '''Vasco''' || '''Not discovered '''|| |- | I had an affair with a famous Portuguese footballer || '''Vera''' || '''Andreia'''<sup>[[#endnote 2|2]] </sup> || Day 65 |- | I spent nine years in a convent || '''Daniela''' || '''Not discovered''' || |- | We are a fake couple || '''Hugo M. and Joana''' || '''Jade'''<sup>[[#endnote 1|1]] </sup> || Day 18 |- | I'm an accomplice of "The Voice" ("A Voz") || '''Catarina''' || '''Hugo F.''' || Day 46 |- | We are a real couple || '''Ana Isabel and VÃ­tor''' || '''Renato''' || Day 25 |- | I have an obsessive-compulsive disorder || '''Ivo''' || '''AntÃ³nio''' || Day 80 |- | I was the owner of a brothel || '''AntÃ³nio''' || '''Ivo''' || Day 82 |- | I had a paranormal experience || '''Hugo F.''' || '''Not discovered''' || |- | I posed nude for a magazine || '''Doriana''' || '''Not discovered''' || |- | I have a twin brother in the house || '''MÃ¡rio and Renato''' || '''Ana Isabel'''|| Day 2 |- | I was in more than 250 relationships || '''ZÃ© Miguel''' || '''Not discovered ''' || |- | I worked as an escort || '''Andreia''' || '''Ivo''' || Day 66 |- | I was in a robbery || '''Jade''' || '''Not discovered ''' || |} In italic are secrets that were not revealed during live shows, but "discovered" by the media. This means that those secrets are not officially confirmed.
<small>[[#endnote 1|Note 1]]: Even though their secret was discovered, both agreed to continue the relationship.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 2|Note 2]]: Vera revealed her secret to other housemates on Day 22, without saying that its her secret.</small>
==Week's Summary== ===Week 1 (October 3rd to October 10th)=== '''Entrances''': All the housemates entered in the House on Day 1.
'''Secret Missions, Tasks & Accounts''': MÃ¡rio and Renato are twin brothers. While one is in the house, the other is in a secret room. They take turns being with the other housemates, under the name Renato. If they succeed to do this until Day 2, both of them will stay in the house. If they fail, they will be nominated and the public will vote to evict one of them.<ref>Their secret was discovered by Ana Isabel on Day 2 and therefore they were nominated. TVI, ''Renato Ã© chamado ao confessionÃ¡rio'', "[http://www.tvi.iol.pt/secretstory/noticias/secretstory-renato-gala-confessionario/1196131-5647.html]",</ref> Hugo F. has a mission to wear unusual clothing and make the other housemates believe that they are his actual clothes. If he succeeds without any other of the housemates finding out his mission, he will win 1000â¬. If they find out, he will lose 1000â¬. He passed the task.<ref>TVI,''Hugo F. Ã© chamado ao confessionÃ¡rio'',"[http://www.tvi.iol.pt/secretstory/noticias/secretstory-hugof-gala-confessionario/1196136-5647.html]"</ref> On Day 1, "a Voz" gave Jade a secret mission: she has to pretend that she likes VÃ­tor, whose secret is that he has his girlfriend in the house (Ana Isabel). "A Voz" gave a task to the whole group. They had to say the person they most liked and the one they least liked over the first hours. This task showed that the least popular person in the house was Renato (when the task was done they didn't knew about the twins yet) and that Andreia was the most popular member in the house. "A Voz" took 500â¬ away from all of the housemates because they jumped to the pool with the microphones.
'''Secrets''': As MÃ¡rio's and Renato's secret was discovered by Ana Isabel, they lost all their money for Ana Isabel's account. Hugo F. tried to discover AntÃ³nio's secret on Day 1 but failed, and therefore half of his account money went to AntÃ³nio. On Day 2, AntÃ³nio thought that the twins were actually triplets and decided to press the secrets button. As that wasn't true, half of his money went to the twins' account. Doriana pressed the secret button saying that AntÃ³nio's secret is that he is a witch. Her answer was not right and half of her account went to AntÃ³nio. Vasco's secret was the officially revealed one during the eviction show.
'''Nominations''': For the first eviction of the week, MÃ¡rio and Renato are automatic up for eviction since Ana Isabel discovered their secret on Day 2.On Day 4, Joana and Doriana were the most nominated housemates with 5 and 3 votes respectively, and therefore are up for eviction.
'''Exits''': '''MÃ¡rio''' was evicted on Day 4 with 28% to save. '''Doriana''' was evicted on Day 7 with 68% to evict.
===Week 2 (October 11th to October 17th)=== '''Secret Missions, Tasks & Accounta''': ZÃ© Miguel had to steal Jade's [[Yoda]] doll, which is very important to her because she says that it helps her during emotional problems with answers like 'yes', 'no', 'try again', etc. (The toy, a McDonalds Happy Meal toy, is similar to a [[Magic Eight Ball]]). He then had to incriminate Ivo. He failed the task and lost 500â¬. Also on that day, "A Voz" gave all the housemates a task: they had to answer questions about other housemates. Since only 3 answers were correct out of 15, all the housemates lost 1000â¬ . AntÃ³nio had a mission to make all the other housemates believe that his first love was for a sheep. Daniela got a mission to pretend that she is interested in Vasco. She passed the task and therefore she won some hours alone with Vasco in a secret room. Hugo M. had a mission to teach AntÃ³nio how to swim in 48 hours. He failed the task and lost 1000â¬. All the housemates had a task: in the living room there were 3 roosters eluding to the tic-tac-toe game that in Portugal is called "Jogo dos galos" (The rooster's game). Also on that day, there was a dance competition in witch the male and female winner would get 300â¬ to their account. Joana and Renato won the game and both won 300â¬.
'''Secrets''': Hugo F. tried to discover Ana and VÃ­tor's secret but he didn't have enough money to do so. He then confronted Ana Isabel and she confirmed her secret. Thanks to that, she lost all her money - 9100â¬ - and went from the richest member in the house to the poorest. Andreia won 100â¬ for passing a task. VÃ­tor tried to discover Vera's secret, by saying that he though she is an ex-alcoholic. Since that is not her secret, he lost half of his money to her. Vasco thought that Ana Isabel's secret is that she lived 9 years in a convent. He lost half of his money to Ana Isabel. In a strategic move, Hugo M. tried to discover Joana's secret (strategic because their secret is that they are a fake couple). He said that Joana's secret is that she is the accomplice of "a Voz". Therefore he lost half of his money to Joana. Doriana's and Catarina's secret was the officially revealed one during the eviction show.
'''Nominations''': Vasco and VÃ­tor were both up for eviction with 3 nominations each.
'''Exits''': '''Vasco''' was evicted on Day 14 with 69% of the votes.
===Week 3 (October 18th to October 24th)=== '''Secret Missions & Tasks''': As a move by being the accomplice of "a Voz", Catarina has to make an housemate or housemates of her choice believe that Hugo F. is the accomplice. She has influence that person so much, that they will click on the "Button of Secrets". She revealed her mission to Jade and therefore lost all her money. Also, she has to steal cigarettes every day til "a Voz" tells her to stop. As a task given on Day 15,but done through the whole week all the housemates had to become "masters". They all would get a individual mission to perform with the other housemates. As they passed they would win 500â¬. Then a "Master of the Masters" would get 1000â¬, and Renato won it.For this weeks shopping mission, housemates had to cross the pool as many times as they could. Each time they crossed it they won some time in the storage room to take as much food as they could. They won 2m20s. On Day 17 all the housemates had to play a game in which they shared their true feelings about the other housemates. The most sincere housemate would win 1000â¬. Renato and Hugo M. had a mission on Day 18 to make a special dinner for the other without they discovering. Vera had a mission to make AntÃ³nio believe that she's in love with him. She will win 500â¬ if she passes. On Day 19, all the housemates lost half of their money because of two reasons: The first, is that some people thrown tennis balls to the garden with information about Ana and Vitor's secret or saying things about Ana Isabel and Vitor. Daniela and Andreia grabbed the balls and read it to most of the people. The other reason is that everyone keeps talking about secrets with each other, but the secrets have to be discovered by clicking in the Button of Secrets.
'''Accounts & Secrets''': Jade discovered Joana and Hugo M. secret and all their account money went to Jade's account. Ivo and Hugo F. won 50â¬ for answering correctly a question in the phone. Andreia's secret was the officially revealed one during the eviction show.
'''Nominations''': Ana Isabel and Daniela both received 3 nominations and are up for eviction.
'''Exits''': '''Daniela''' was evicted on Day 21 with 62% of the public vote.
===Week 4 (October 25th to October 31st)=== '''Secret missions, Tasks & Accounts''': On Day 22 all the housemates had to stay 50 hours on a bike. There were two lights, red and white, the light had to stay white. If a housemate is on its turn and the light goes red he/she will lose 200â¬. If he/she passes will win 200â¬ and if the mission is passed as group, everyone would get massage kits. Jade and Hugo F. have to make the others believe that they are in love. They won 500â¬. They made a deal with "a Voz". During the first weeks the other housemates believe that his and Andreia's secret is that both are exs. He has to make the other believe in that once again. Andreia had a secret mission to make the others believe that she is in love with Renato. She failed the task and lost 500â¬. For the shopping task, in order to give time to go to the store room and take the food, several personalities passed on the screen in the living room. For each person the housemates remember after the video they would won sometime in the store room. They won 3 minutes. Hugo M. had a mission on Day 25 to teach everyone a gym class at 14:00 in the yellow clock (in a wall in the house there are a lot of clocks, and all are wrong). He failed and received a punishment: he lost 200â¬ while everyone else won 300â¬. On Day 26, the housemates were divided in two groups: man and women. The women had to do a replica in clay of Jade's Yoda doll, while the men group had to do a replica of a Porsche car in clay. The winner were the women group. AntÃ³nio had a mission to make the biggest number of housemates laugh. He failed and lost 300â¬.
'''Secrets''': Vera said to the other housemates her secret, without saying that its her secret. Because of that she lost all her account money. Renato discovered VÃ­tor and Ana Isabel's secret on Day 25 and therefore got all their account money into his account. Daniela and AntÃ³nio's secret were revealed during the eviction show.
'''Nominations''': On Day 22 the phone rang. Ivo was the first to answer the phone and therefore immunized himself from being nominated this week. In Day 23 the nominations took place. Hugo F., Renato and VÃ­tor had all three nominations. As in the Portuguese rules only two housemates can be up, the girls had to nominate for a second round, but they could only nominate one of the three tied housemates. Renato and VÃ­tor both received three nominations in the second round and therefore both are up.
'''Exits''': '''Renato''' was evicted on Day 28 with 73% of the public vote to evict.
'''Other''': On Day 23, two cats entered the house. They were named Woody and Rute.
===Week 5 (November 1st to November 7th)=== '''Secret missions,Tasks & Accounts''': All the housemates had to do puppets of other housemates during the whole week, and in the final of the week they'll do a sketch with them. To celebrate the Halloween the housemates had to do a character in a pumpkin. This task started on the 4th week but was only concluded on Day 29. Ana Isabel won the task and received 600â¬ to her account. On Day 30 the girls took part in a beauty pageant, and the boys had to decide the winner. They chose Catarina. She won beauty products. ZÃ© Miguel had to make the other housemates believe that his secret is that his IQ is above the normal. To win time to go the storage room and take the food, they had to do a shooting game. They won 1min and 58sec. The also had a mission to peel vegetables for solidarity divided in three turns. Everyone passed the mission and therefore won 1000â¬. Catarina had an order to put Ivo nervous. She had to hide his glasses and hat and also to put hair in his bed. On Day 33 AntÃ³nio had a mission to make Ivo and Hugo F. mad. He passed and won 2000â¬. A letter was put in the garden. As ZÃ© Miguel was the first to see it, he won 1000â¬. The housemates played a game of Bingo. Vera was the winner and won 6000â¬ and Ivo and Hugo F. won 1000â¬ as runner-ups. ZÃ© Miguel had a mission to convince the other to take part in a Portuguese folk dance class. He won 2000â¬.
'''Secrets''': On Day 31, as a strategic move, Jade tried to discover Hugo F.'s secret: She says that she is practically sure that she will be evicted against Ana Isabel, and, even if the secret isn't right, she would give all her money to someone instead of being evicted with her money. She said that Hugo F. took part in a solidarity mission in Afghanistan. As that is not Hugo F. secret, half of her money Jade's money went to Hugo F. Hugo F. tried to discover Ivo's secret: He said that he is the accomplice of "a Voz". As that's not Ivo's secret, half of his money went to Ivo. On Day 33 AntÃ³nio tried to discover Jade, Hugo F. and Ivo's secret (he said that they all had a shared secret). He said that Hufo F. is Jade's brother and that Ivo is Jade's boyfriend. He lost half of his money to all of them. ZÃ© Miguel tried to discover Catarina's secret: He said that she is bisexual. That's not her secret, and half of his money went to Catarina. Ivo's secret was the one revealed during the eviction show.
'''Nominations''': The phone rang on Day 29, and as Andreia was the first to answer it she won immunization for the week. On Day 30 the nominations took place. Jade received 4 nominations and Ana Isabel 3, being the most voted and therefore are up for eviction.
'''Exits''':'''Jade''' was evicted on Day 35 with 56% of the public vote.
===Week 6 (November 8th to November 14th)=== '''Secret missions, Tasks & Accounts:'''Andreia had a mission to ask ZÃ© Miguel and AntÃ³nio some questions. She partially passed and won 500â¬. Vera had a mission to teach a hip hop class to other housemates and won 2000â¬. She also chose Joana as the worst student and Joana lost 800â¬. " A Voz" gave a mission to Ana Isabel: She has to keep all the housemates indoors for 1 hour. However, a few minutes later, "a Voz" also gave Vera a mission: to keep all the housemates in the garden for one hour. Ana Isabel kept everyone in he kitchen and won 500â¬, while Vera lost 500â¬. Hugo F. and Ana Isabel won 500â¬ for the phone at the 3rd ring. The housemates have to jump through a circle in row without touching the circle. The lower the time they can do that, the bigger the prize will be. The prize was the time to go to the storage. They've won 3m10s. Hugo M., AntÃ³nio and VÃ­tor had a mission to be the "chef" of the day. They passed and won 1000â¬. All the housemates had a task to plant some flowers in the garden. All the housemates had a task to tell a story about them. The winner would receive 2000â¬. Ivo won, but declined the prize, and divided the money with the other housemates. The housemates had to label all the objects in the house with a time limit. They passed. The housemates had a mission to learn how to dance [[tango (ballroom)|Tango]]. Even though this was optional, all the housemates took part.
'''Secrets''': On Day 36, Hugo F. tried to discover AntÃ³nio's secret saying that the secret is that AntÃ³nio is a virgin and wants to stay like that til the marriage. Half of his money went to AntÃ³nio. On day 37 Andreia tried to discover AntÃ³nio's secret. She said that AntÃ³nio wants to find his wife inside the house. Half of her money went to AntÃ³nio. Also on Day 38, ZÃ© Miiguel clicked the Button of Secrets saying that Hugo F.'s secret is that he thinks that he is the perfect man, half of his money went to ZÃ© Miguel. VÃ­tor also tried to discover AntÃ³nio's secret. He said that the secret is that AntÃ³nio wants to marry inside the house, and so half of his money went to AntÃ³nio. Hugo M. also tried to discover Hugo F.'s. He said that Hugo F. is that he is an "Don Juan". As that's not Hugo F.'s secret, half of Hugo M.'s money went to Hugo F. Jade's secret was the one officially revealed during the eviction show. Catarina said that ZÃ© Miguel's secret is that he is an "Don Juan". Half of her money went to ZÃ© Miguel.
'''Nominations:''' On Day 37, Hugo M. was automatically nominated for "a Voz" by breaking the rules of the game. On the nominations, ZÃ© Miguel and AntÃ³nio received three nominations. So, all three were up.
'''Exits''': '''Hugo M.''' was evicted on Day 42 with 53% of the public vote.
===Week 7 (November 15th to November 21st)=== '''Secret missions,Tasks & Accounts:'''Vera and AntÃ³nio had a shared mission. VÃ­tor had to criticise the food of the day. He's mission was discovered by Ana Isabel and therefore he failed. The housemates had a task to tell some jokes. Joana and ZÃ© Miguel won 500â¬. When a song played, thaty had to go to a wooden horse and neigh. The housemates had to do pairs and make an act of comedy. Ana Isabel had to put on a wedding dress. Later she had to throw five bouquet to all the men in the house. As all the bouquets were caught, she won 3500â¬. On Day 46, '''VÃ­tor had the so called "wort secret mission":'''He had to pretend he walked and is now watching everyone in a secret room and watched the other housemates. The moment he said he "walked" his girlfriend, Ana Isabel, started crying and said that she would walked and tension came to the house. He passed the task and won not only 5000â¬ as also he spent an entire night with Ana Isabel alone in the secret room. Housemates had a resistance task called "walk over water". Joana was the female winner and AntÃ³nio was the male winner. They won a special prize. An henhouse with a chicken was put in the garde. The three nominees had to dress a kitchen suit and always that the chicken stepped on a little target in the floor, they had to say a sentence about chickens.
'''Secrets''': On Day 43 Vera tried to discover Catarina's secret. She said that Catarina was sexually abused. As that's not right, half of her money went to Catarina. Ivo tried to discover Hugo F.'s secret. He said that he is Ana Isabel's ex-boyfriend. That's not his secret. Ana Isabel also tried AntÃ³nio's secret. She said that he can predict the future and help people with it. As that's not his secret, half of her money went to AntÃ³nio. On Day 46, ZÃ© Miguel treid to discover Catarina's secret. He said that she is homossexual. That's not her secret. Later on that day, Hugo F. discovered Catarina's secret, and won all her money. Vera's secret was the one officially revealed.
'''Nominations''': Andreia received four votes, while Joana, Ana Isabel and Catarina received 2 votes. Therefore Andreia was up and the other three had to go to a 2nd round. In that round, Joana and Catarina received two votes, and are both up with Andreia.
'''Exits''': '''Catarina''' was evicted on Day 49 with 37% of the public vote.
===Week 8 (November 22nd to November 28th)=== '''Secret missions, Tasks, & Accounts: '''Hugo F. has a mission to pretend that he has hallutinations for 4 days. On the "hallucinations" he has to say his thoughts about some secrets, and he has to make other housemates click on that secrets. This week is the get healthy week. For each kilogram a housemate loses, some money they will win. For the storage task, housemates will write "Secret Story with some dominoes. The most the pieces stay up, the more time they won in the storage. Ivo had a mission to get close to five persons for more than 5 minutes. He passed and won a dinner with the five persons. All the housemates had a task to tell what they most like about them and other persons and also who they should live with in the exterior. Andreia and AntÃ³nio won 500â¬.
'''Nominations''': In the first round, Hugo F. received 3 votes and became nominated, but as VÃ­tor and ZÃ© Miguel tied in 2nd place with 2 votes, there was a second round. In that 2nd round VÃ­tor and ZÃ© Miguel tied again with 2 votes and therefore are both up with Hugo F.
'''Exits''': '''VÃ­tor''' was ejected on Day 54. '''ZÃ© Miguel''' was evicted on Day 56 with 62% of the public vote.
===Week 9 (November 29th to December 5th)=== '''Secret Missions & Taks''': Many secret missions were held, and the task for the storage time was to play a golf game.
'''Secrets''': A lot of attempts to discover secrets were made, but no one got it right.
'''Nominations''': Ana Isabel and Joana were both nominated with 2 votes.
'''Eviction''': '''Joana''' was evicted with 54% of the public vote.
===Week 10 (December 6th to December 12th)=== '''Secret Missions & Taks''': Many secret missions were held, and the task for the storage time was to knit scarves as long as they could.
'''Secrets''': On Day 65 Andreia discovered Vera's secret. On Day 66 Ivo discovered Andreia's secret. Many other attempts were made.
'''Nominations''': On Day 65 all the male houseamtes received one nomination and are up.
'''Eviction''': '''Hugo F.''' was evicted with 46% of the public vote on Day 70.
===Week 11 (December 13th to December 19th)=== '''Secret Missions & Taks''': Many secret missions were held, including the storage and the Facebook mission.
'''Secrets''': Many attempts were made to discover the remaining secrets.
'''Nominations''': On Day 72 Ana Isabel and Andreia received 2 nominations and are up for eviction.
'''Eviction''': '''Andreia''' was evicted on Day 77 with 55% of the public vote.
===Week 12 (December 20th to December 26th)=== '''Secret missions, tasks & accounts''': Many secret missions were made on this week.
'''Secrets''': A lot of clues were puted in the house for the two secrets left. AntÃ³nio discovered Ivo's secret, while Ivo discovered AntÃ³nio's secret.

<small>[[#endnote 1|Note 1]] : MÃ¡rio and Renato were on a secret mission related to their shared secret. They are twins and while one is in the house, the other is in a secret room. They take turns in being in the house both under the name Renato. If the other housemates find out before Day 2, they will be both up for eviction. If they succeed, both will stay in the house. Their secret was discovered on Day 2 by Ana Isabel, and therefore they went up for eviction. MÃ¡rio was eliminated on day 4.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 2|Note 2]] : In round one of nominations, only male housemates could nominate and only female housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 3|Note 3]]: In round two of nominations, only female housemates could nominate and only male housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 4|Note 4]]: In round three of nominations, only male housemates could nominate and only female housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 5|Note 5]]: On Day 22 the phone rang. Ivo was the first to answer to it and by doing that he immunized himself from being nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 6|Note 6]]: In round four of nominations, only female housemates could be nominate and only male housemates cold be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 7|Note 7]]: Hugo F, Renato and VÃ­tor had all three votes. As in the Portuguese version of the rules only two housemates can be up for eviction, there was a second round of nominations. In bold is the housemate nominated in the second round. In the second round only girls could nominate, and they could only nominate the 3 housemates that were tied.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 8|Note 8]]: The phone rang on Day 30. As Andreia was the first to answer the phone, she won immunization from the nominations.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 9|Note 9]]:In round five of nominations, only male housemates could nominate and only female housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 10|Note 10]]: Hugo M. was automatically nominated for constant breaking of the rules imposed by "a Voz".</small>
<small>[[#endnote 11|Note 11]]: In round six of nominations, only female housemates could nominated, and only male housemates could be nominated. This week there was an exception in rules, that it was 3 housemates up for eviction rather than two.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 12|Note 12]]: In round seven of nominations, only male housemates could nominated, and only female housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 13|Note 13]]: In the first round Andreia received 4 votes and was automatically up, but Joana, Ana Isabel and Catarina received two vots, and went to an 2nd round. In that round, Joana and Catarina both received two votes and tied, and therefore are up with Andreia. In bold are the nominations that housemates made in the 2nd round.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 14|Note 14]]: In round eight of nominations, only female housemates could nominated, and only male housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 15|Note 15]]: In the first round Hugo F. received 3 votes and was automatically up, but VÃ­tor and ZÃ© Miguel received 2 votes, and went to an 2nd round. In that round, both received two votes and tied, and therefore are up with Hugo F. . In bold are the nominations that housemates made in the 2nd round.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 16|Note 16]]: VÃ­tor was originally nominatd but later he was ejected.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 17|Note 17]]: In round nine of nominations, only male housemates could nominated, and only female housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 18|Note 18]]: In round ten of nominations, only female housemates could nominated, and only male housemates could be nominated. Housemates nominated only one person.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 19|Note 19]]: In round eleven of nominations, only male housemates could nominated, and only female housemates could be nominated.</small>
<small>[[#endnote 20|Note 20]]: On the last two weeks there was no nominations and people voted for who they wanted to win.</small>
==Accounts== As said above, all the housemates entered the house with a budget: 5000â¬. They won and lost money with missions and by revealing the secrets.
